item.title: What's your Vim Name?
item.description: I'm a few weeks into moving to Vim as my main editor, I've stopped crying and shaking mostly (at least about my editing ability). Now I'm wondering: what's your Vim name? And who's got the best one? As far as I can work out, my Vim name is: Replace everything from the cursor to the end of the line with 've'. Which is what happens if I get bored and type my name (Dave) into Vim.
